newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Central bank dollar/rouble rates 5298/5338 FXSU.
newsitem.headline: Central bank dollar/rouble rates 5298/5338 FXSU.

text.p: The Russian Central Bank said it had set 5298/5338 roubles per dollar as its bid and offer rates for its operations on the currency market on Friday.
The official rate for Saturday will be 5318.
On Thursday the bid/offer rates were 5291/5331, with the official dollar rate 5311 from Friday.
The Central Bank announces daily bid/offer dollar/rouble rates for its currency operations. The midpoint of these rates is the official dollar/rouble rate for the following day.
The daily corridor for the rouble on the interbank market is 5145/5745 after 5142/5742.
